title: ‘My son is a fan’: Trump praises Saudi League Star Ronaldo
text:
‘My son is a fan’: Trump praises Saudi League Star Ronaldo

Donald Trump highlighted the presence of the Portuguese footballer during the gala dinner he hosted for Saudi Arabia's Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman. "Barron got to meet him, and I think he respects his father a little bit more now. Just the fact that I introduced you." joked the US president. Ronaldo, the star of the Saudi league, was one of the distinguished guests at the event.
